d1_text:
Npc0082:
ï¿½Some suspicious-looking kids are hanging out in the woods north of the library.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I wonder if they are members of the Sharks.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½To stop the spread of the gang,[PAUSE 15] someone should shut down their gathering places,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½don't you think?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I've started a movement[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that will stop all of the bad influences on the children of Onett.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I call it the ï¿½Fresh Breeze Movement.ï¿½[PAUSE 15]  Hum de dum dum...[HALT][END]
